parameterDefinitions.description:
Ansible-polymer Infrastructure repository version
Primary branches are:
  master
  develop

Set branch value as needed if you wish to test deployment code updates
parameterDefinitions.name: infra_version

parameterDefinitions.description: Do you need to run/re-run the steps to configure the server(s) Operating System?
parameterDefinitions.name: task_configure_os

parameterDefinitions.description: Do you need to run/re-run the steps to configure the server(s) to run the Polymer Stack?
parameterDefinitions.name: task_configure_polymer

parameterDefinitions.description:
Destroy and reload database with fresh a scrubbed dump on this stack. 
NOTE: You must also enable the data_reindex option below otherwise search data will be stale.

Only Scrubbed data is allowed. If regular data is required please request a dedicated stack from DevOps.
parameterDefinitions.name: data_import

parameterDefinitions.description:
Reindex all of the elastic search data.
NOTE: You must enable this option if doing a data_import above.
parameterDefinitions.name: data_reindex

parameterDefinitions.description: Deploy all code changes to the Polymer application. Keep this box checked if you would like to deploy new code. Un-check this box to save time if you are just restarting the application process or reloading the database reindexing search.
parameterDefinitions.name: task_deploy

parameterDefinitions.description: Select True to remove cached files: node_modules, jspm_modules, gems, local repo copy, and build directories.  All assets are then freshly downloaded
parameterDefinitions.name: clean_deploy

parameterDefinitions.description: Restart the platform application processes (this does not reboot the server)
parameterDefinitions.name: restart

description:
This is the Ansible stack management for the qa3 environment

https://polymer-qa3.dev.gloo.us

Version Instructions:
Specify the branches if you'd like to build 

Possible options: 
<branchName> 
<tagName>
<commitId>

Default Polymer Branch:  mainline
Default ansible Branch:  master
name: polymer-qa3.dev.gloo.us

healthReport.description: Build stability: No recent builds failed.
